item.title: Michael Dell Spent 40 Years Preparing for an AI Boom No One Expected
item.description: The man who founded Dell in a Texas dorm room has transformed his company. It’s not just about PCs anymore.

item.title: There Are Mystery Drones Flying Over My House. I Tried to Track Them Down.
item.description: Authorities say unexplained aircraft over New Jersey is no cause for concern. My neighbors, however, are concerned.

item.title: Meta Urges California Attorney General to Stop OpenAI From Becoming For-Profit
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg’s company is siding with Elon Musk in a fight against the developer of ChatGPT.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Find insight on Broadcom, Netflix, ReadyTech and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: U.S. Prepares New AI Chip Restrictions to Close China's Backdoor Access
item.description: Washington plans rules limiting semiconductor shipments to some countries accused of supplying Beijing.
